text: The Gaikriya Koli, or Garikariya Koli is a subcaste of the Koli caste found in the Indian state of Uttrakhand. == Origin == The Gaikriya Kolis worship the cow (Gai) like other upper castes so they called as Gaikriya Kolis and enjoy the upper status among society. == Related pages == * Sucha Koli == References == Category:Koli subcastes
title: Gaikriya Koli
